snippet.title: After I Met That Catgirl, My Questlist Got Too Long! PV
snippet.description:
Catgirl's Questlist is a hybrid RPG / visual novel now available on PC. 

Players take the role of Vera, a charm witch with an undying love for women. After a fateful meeting with a catgirl who claims to come from another world, they form a guild and need to run it against all odds. Slay monsters, complete quests, explore the vast Kingdom of Ostmoor, and develop your bond with a colorful cast of companions. Vera is ready for romance and adventure!
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Get the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1071220/After_I_met_that_catgirl_my_questlist_got_too_long/

Read more about the successful Kickstarter:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/rascaldevworks/after-i-met-that-catgirl-my-questlist-got-too-long
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
CREDITS

Art by Thai Chau

Trailer by White Charisma
https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=36249

Music by Bitter Sweet Entertainment, Inc.
